author: Mohamed Oumoumad
description: This script saves screenshots in a loop with determined number and interval between each screenshot.

params.name: Monitor number
params.tooltip: 0 is the main monitor, to capture all monitors select a number that is superior to the total monitors you have

params.name: Screenshots num
params.tooltip: The total number of the screenshots

params.name: Interval
params.tooltip: The time interval between each screenshot in seconds

params.name: Output name
params.tooltip: The prefix name for the screenshot, each one will have a suffix of date and time

params.name: Include time
params.tooltip: Check to include the time of the creation in the file name as a suffix

params.name: Include date
params.tooltip: Check to include the date of the creation in the file name as a suffix

params.name: Output directory
params.tooltip: Choose a directory where you want to save the screenshots
